title: Online Driver's Manual Course Curriculum Vendors
text_content:
If you are planning to offer an online driver's manual course for someone who fails the general knowledge test three times, you may use a curriculum provided by a vendor below.
3A Method Driving Schools
www.adrivingschoolonline.com
info@3amethod.com
(301) 366-8449
Commonwealth Driver Improvement Clinic
www.cdicdrivingschool.com
info@cdicdrivingschool.com
(804) 238-5883
If you wish to develop your own curriculum, be aware that it must be approved by the Department of Motor Vehicles prior to use.
For more information regarding the requirements for opening an online driver training school, refer to the
Virginia Online Driver Training School Licensing Requirements
.
See
In-Person 8-Hour Driver's Manual Curriculum Providers
.
